MTN MoMo API

Guide Complet de Test avec Postman

Workflow Application de Livraison - Sandbox

VOS CREDENTIALS

Primary Key Collection: 9ade632def3e4f77895019a28ed472c7

Primary Key Disbursement: 75723704a9c849cbbdf303242fdcb712

1. Schema du Workflow Complet

Le workflow se divise en 3 phases principales :

Phase

Description

APIs utilisees

SETUP

Creation API User + API Key (une seule fois)

POST /v1_0/apiuser + POST /apiuser/{id}/apikey

PAIEMENT

Client paie sa commande

POST /collection/token + POST /requesttopay

REFUND

Remboursement si annulation

POST /disbursement/token + POST /transfer

Flux simplifie :

CLIENT BACKEND MTN MoMo

| | |

|-- 1. Commande + Tel ---->| |

| |-- 2. requestToPay ------>|

| |<-- 3. 202 Accepted ------|

|<-- 4. Notif PIN -----------------------------------|

|-- 5. Entre PIN MoMo -------------------------------->|

| |<-- 6. Callback SUCCESS --|

|<-- 7. Confirmation ------| |

| | |

| [Si annulation/refus] |

| |-- 8. transfer (refund) ->|

|<-- 9. SMS remboursement ----------------------------|


2. PHASE SETUP (une seule fois)

Cette phase cree vos identifiants API. A faire une seule fois.

2.1 Requete 1 : Creer API User Collection

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/v1_0/apiuser

Headers :

Key

Value

X-Reference-Id

11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

9ade632def3e4f77895019a28ed472c7

Content-Type

application/json

Body (raw JSON) :

{

"providerCallbackHost": "webhook.site"

}

Reponse attendue : 201 Created (body vide)

2.2 Requete 2 : Generer API Key Collection

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/v1_0/apiuser/11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111/apikey

Headers :

Key

Value

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

9ade632def3e4f77895019a28ed472c7

Body : VIDE (aucun body)

Reponse attendue : 201 Created

{

"apiKey": "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx"

}

IMPORTANT : Notez cette apiKey ! Vous en aurez besoin.

2.3 Requete 3 : Creer API User Disbursement

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/v1_0/apiuser

Headers :

Key

Value

X-Reference-Id

22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

75723704a9c849cbbdf303242fdcb712

Content-Type

application/json

Body (raw JSON) :

{

"providerCallbackHost": "webhook.site"

}

2.4 Requete 4 : Generer API Key Disbursement

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/v1_0/apiuser/22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222/apikey

Headers :

Key

Value

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

75723704a9c849cbbdf303242fdcb712

Body : VIDE


3. PHASE PAIEMENT (Collection)

Le client passe commande et paie avec son compte MoMo.

3.1 Requete 5 : Obtenir Access Token Collection

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/collection/token/

Authorization (onglet Auth dans Postman) :

Type

Basic Auth

Username

11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111

Password

[API Key obtenue a la Requete 2]

Headers :

Key

Value

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

9ade632def3e4f77895019a28ed472c7

Body : VIDE

Reponse attendue : 200 OK

{

"access_token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGci...",

"token_type": "access_token",

"expires_in": 3600

}

IMPORTANT : Notez access_token ! Expire apres 1 heure.

3.2 Requete 6 : Request to Pay (Collecter paiement)

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/collection/v1_0/requesttopay

Headers :

Key

Value

Authorization

Bearer [ACCESS_TOKEN]

X-Reference-Id

aaaa1111-bbbb-2222-cccc-333344445555

X-Target-Environment

sandbox

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

9ade632def3e4f77895019a28ed472c7

Content-Type

application/json

Body (raw JSON) :

{

"amount": "5000",

"currency": "EUR",

"externalId": "order_pizza_001",

"payer": {

"partyIdType": "MSISDN",

"partyId": "46733123453"

},

"payerMessage": "Payment for Pizza Order",

"payeeNote": "Pizza Margherita x2"

}

Reponse attendue : 202 Accepted (body vide)

3.3 Requete 7 : Verifier statut paiement

Methode

GET

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/collection/v1_0/requesttopay/aaaa1111-bbbb-2222-cccc-333344445555

Headers :

Key

Value

Authorization

Bearer [ACCESS_TOKEN]

X-Target-Environment

sandbox

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

9ade632def3e4f77895019a28ed472c7

Body : VIDE (c'est un GET)

Reponse attendue : 200 OK

{

"amount": "5000",

"currency": "EUR",

"financialTransactionId": "123456789",

"externalId": "order_pizza_001",

"payer": {

"partyIdType": "MSISDN",

"partyId": "46733123453"

},

"status": "SUCCESSFUL"

}


4. PHASE REMBOURSEMENT (Disbursement)

Le commercant refuse OU le client annule = Remboursement automatique.

4.1 Requete 8 : Obtenir Access Token Disbursement

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/disbursement/token/

Authorization (onglet Auth dans Postman) :

Type

Basic Auth

Username

22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222

Password

[API Key obtenue a la Requete 4]

Headers :

Key

Value

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

75723704a9c849cbbdf303242fdcb712

Body : VIDE

4.2 Requete 9 : Transfer (Rembourser le client)

Methode

POST

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/disbursement/v1_0/transfer

Headers :

Key

Value

Authorization

Bearer [ACCESS_TOKEN_DISBURSEMENT]

X-Reference-Id

bbbb2222-cccc-3333-dddd-444455556666

X-Target-Environment

sandbox

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

75723704a9c849cbbdf303242fdcb712

Content-Type

application/json

Body (raw JSON) :

{

"amount": "5000",

"currency": "EUR",

"externalId": "refund_order_pizza_001",

"payee": {

"partyIdType": "MSISDN",

"partyId": "46733123453"

},

"payerMessage": "Refund for cancelled order",

"payeeNote": "Sorry for inconvenience"

}

ATTENTION : C'est 'payee' (pas 'payer') car vous ENVOYEZ de l'argent AU client !

4.3 Requete 10 : Verifier statut remboursement

Methode

GET

URL

https://sandbox.momodeveloper.mtn.com/disbursement/v1_0/transfer/bbbb2222-cccc-3333-dddd-444455556666

Headers :

Key

Value

Authorization

Bearer [ACCESS_TOKEN_DISBURSEMENT]

X-Target-Environment

sandbox

Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

75723704a9c849cbbdf303242fdcb712

Body : VIDE

6. Ordre d'Execution

Executez les requetes dans cet ordre :

SETUP (une seule fois)

=======================

1. Requete 1 : Creer API User Collection --> 201 Created

2. Requete 2 : Generer API Key Collection --> Noter apiKey

3. Requete 3 : Creer API User Disbursement --> 201 Created

4. Requete 4 : Generer API Key Disbursement --> Noter apiKey

SCENARIO PAIEMENT

==================

5. Requete 5 : Token Collection --> Noter access_token

6. Requete 6 : Request to Pay --> 202 Accepted

7. Requete 7 : Verifier statut --> SUCCESSFUL

SCENARIO REMBOURSEMENT (si annulation)

=======================================

8. Requete 8 : Token Disbursement --> Noter access_token

9. Requete 9 : Transfer (remboursement) --> 202 Accepted

10. Requete 10 : Verifier statut refund --> SUCCESSFUL

Document genere pour tests Postman - MTN MoMo Sandbox

Decembre 2025
